urlset:
[% r.absolute('/') %] always 1.0
[% r.absolute('/archive') %] monthly 0.1
[% FOR year IN archive %] [% FOR month IN year.months %] [% IF month.count %] [% r.absolute(month.link) %] [% END %] [% END %] [% END %]
[% FOR entry IN entries %] [% priority = 1.0 - (loop.index / loop.size) %]
[% r.absolute('/' _ entry.path) %] [% IF 0 %][% entry.lastmod %][% END %] [% priority < 0.1 ? 0.1 : priority %]
[% END %]
